content.query:
CREATE TABLE dbo.Sales (
saleId INT,
productId INT,
customerId INT,
quantity INT,
saledate DATE
);

CREATE TABLE dbo.Products (
productId INT,
ProductName NVARCHAR(100),
category NVARCHAR(100),
price FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE dbo.Customers (
customerId INT,
FirstName NVARCHAR(100),
LastName NVARCHAR(100),
RegionID INT
);
CREATE TABLE dbo.Region (
RegionID INT,
RegionName NVARCHAR (100)
)
COPY INTO dbo.Products
FROM 'https://storagedatalakeengineer.blob.core.windows.net/data/products (5).csv'
WITH (
FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY= 'Shared Access Signature', SECRET='sv=2024-11-04&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2025-06-01T06:29:16Z&st=2025-05-31T22:29:16Z&spr=https&sig=RY%2B6ctYvejy3Zl9ax9pYpd6Mg%2FhvpZakNzVCAjHAhj0%3D'),
FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0A',
FIRSTROW = 2

);

COPY INTO dbo.Customers
FROM 'https://storagedatalakeengineer.blob.core.windows.net/data/customers (4).csv'
WITH (
FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY= 'Shared Access Signature', SECRET='sv=2024-11-04&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2025-06-01T06:29:16Z&st=2025-05-31T22:29:16Z&spr=https&sig=RY%2B6ctYvejy3Zl9ax9pYpd6Mg%2FhvpZakNzVCAjHAhj0%3D'),
FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0A',
FIRSTROW = 2

);

COPY INTO dbo.Region
FROM 'https://storagedatalakeengineer.blob.core.windows.net/data/region.csv'
WITH (
FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY= 'Shared Access Signature', SECRET='sv=2024-11-04&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2025-06-01T06:29:16Z&st=2025-05-31T22:29:16Z&spr=https&sig=RY%2B6ctYvejy3Zl9ax9pYpd6Mg%2FhvpZakNzVCAjHAhj0%3D'),
FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0A',
FIRSTROW = 2
);
COPY INTO dbo.Sales
FROM 'https://storagedatalakeengineer.blob.core.windows.net/data/sales (1).csv'
WITH (
FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY= 'Shared Access Signature', SECRET='sv=2024-11-04&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2025-06-01T06:29:16Z&st=2025-05-31T22:29:16Z&spr=https&sig=RY%2B6ctYvejy3Zl9ax9pYpd6Mg%2FhvpZakNzVCAjHAhj0%3D'),
FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0A',
FIRSTROW = 2
);


SELECT 
    CONCAT(c.firstname, ' ', c.lastname) AS CustomerName,
    r.regionname AS Region,
    p.Productname AS ProductName,
    s.quantity AS Quantity,
    p.Price AS Price,
    (s.quantity * p.Price) AS TotalAmountSold
FROM sales s
JOIN customers c ON s.customerid = c.customerid
JOIN region r ON c.regionid = r.regionid
JOIN Products p ON s.productid = p.productid;
